title: Pixel 4a hearing aids show as paired inblue tooth menu. The Assebility menu says "no hearing aids'?
content: Pixel 4a. Blue tooth shows both left and right are paired. The "app" for the hearing aids to adjust volume and programs, connects. However, in the accessibility menu shows " No Hearings aids connected" my calls and music to not go to my hearing aids as they did on iPhone 11Pro. They are Kirkland (Rexton) 8.0T thanks
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
